name: Purple Dilated Pupil
description:
Purple World is a utopia where’s no violence, nature is purple and your imagination is the only rule to be followed
 
Started as an AR experience that would transform nature’s main color, green, into the most unexpected and vibrant shade of purple.
 
Purple Valley was born, allowing users to dive into their own magical world. People from all over the globe choose to use the effect on a daily basis, with the number of shares surpassing the 20 million mark, and more than 150 million photos being taken in over 60 countries.
 
Now, with so much energy gathered around Earth, we can open the portal to Purple World
 
This special piece is part of ‘Pupila Dilatada’, a community based psychedelic art exhibition
 
The best way to experience Ᵽµŗplε Vall£ÿ is by diving headfirst into its own reality 
Try the augmented reality filter at instagram.com/ar/1013198535714898/ 
 
Get the full experience on Purple Gallery at ottisots.com/metaverse
